description: Blue Star (Amsonia ciliata var. filifolia 'Georgia Pancake') is an amazing plant species due to its versatility. It can be used as a perennial border, ground cover, or a lush protective hedge. It has been known to resist drought and flourish in moist, salty and dry soils. Its foliage is a uniform grey-green that turns yellow and orange in autumn, and its star-shaped flowers are a deep blue. It will add beauty to any garden in any season. Blue Star will provide an eye-catching contrast when planted with evergreens, proving itself a very versatile and reliable plant.
